item.title: Resume
item.description: Athishsreeram Nharayanan Senior Software Engineer with 10+ Years of Professional Experience. Specialized with Backend Distributed Systems, Cloud & Microservices Architecture. LANGUAGES AND TECHNOLGIES Java, Go (Golang), PL/SQL, Typescript, JavaScript, Shell Script, PHP Spring Framework, Angular, Node.js, Hibernate, JPA, JSF Enterprise Architecture, Cloud Computing, Microservice, Data Mining, Business Intelligence Git, Docker, Kubernetes, Istio, Consul, Jira, Confluence, Prometheus, RabbitMQ, NATS UML Argo, Erwin Designer, Microsoft Visio Ant, Maven, Hudson, Sonar, Jenkins, Bamboo, Docker, Ansible Experience BMO FINANCIAL GROUP, Toronto, ON
